languages.text: {n}Неожиданно громогласный голос Висиря вырывает вас из раздумий:{/n} "Смерть приняла тебя, Домин'{name}! Отныне и впредь ты — Кровав{mf|ый|ая} смотритель{mf||ница} ее и почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая} служитель{mf||ница} Неумирающего".

traits.locale_text: {n}Неожиданно громогласный голос Висиря вырывает вас из раздумий:{/n} "Смерть приняла тебя, Домин'{name}! Отныне и впредь ты — Кровав{mf|ый|ая} смотритель{mf||ница} ее и почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая} служитель{mf||ница} Неумирающего".

languages.text: {n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Domin'{name}! Now and for all of time, you are the Bloodwarden and the Undying One's most venerable servant."
languages.original_text: {n}Неожиданно громогласный голос Висиря вырывает вас из раздумий:{/n} "Смерть приняла тебя, Домин'{name}! Отныне и впредь ты — Кровав{mf|ый|ая} смотритель{mf||ница} ее и почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая} служитель{mf||ница} Неумирающего".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Domin'{name}! Now and for all of time, you are the Bloodwarden and the Undying One's most venerable servant."
{n}The Vizsier's suddenly thunderous voice snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Enim'{name}! Henceforth you are the Bloodwarden and the death cult's most venerable Weaver."

{n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Enim'{name}! Henceforth you are the Bloodwarden and the death cult's most venerable weaver."

{n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Enim'{name}! Henceforth you are the Bloodwarden and the death cult's most venerable weaver."

{n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Domin'{name}! Now and for all of time, you are the Bloodwarden and the Undying One's most venerable servant."

{n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Domin'{name}! Now and for all of time, you are the Bloodwarden and the Undying One's most venerable servant."

{n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Domin'{name}! Now and for all of time, you are the Bloodwarden and the Undying One's most venerable servant."

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Wesirs wird plötzlich laut wie Donner und reißt dich aus deinen Gedanken.{/n} "Der Tod hat Euch akzeptiert, Domin'{name}! Jetzt und für immerdar seid Ihr {mf|der Blutwärter und der ehrwürdigste Diener|die Blutwärterin und die ehrwürdigste Dienerin} des Todlosen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Domin'{name}! Now and for all of time, you are the Bloodwarden and the Undying One's most venerable servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Wesirs wird plötzlich laut wie Donner und reißt dich aus deinen Gedanken.{/n} "Der Tod hat Euch akzeptiert, Domin'{name}! Jetzt und für immerdar seid Ihr {mf|der Blutwärter und der ehrwürdigste Diener|die Blutwärterin und die ehrwürdigste Dienerin} des Todlosen."

languages.text: {n}La voz del Visir retumba y te saca de tus ensoñaciones.{/n} «¡La muerte le ha aceptado, Domin'{name}! Ahora y siempre, será Custodi{mf|o|a} de Sangre, {mf|el|la} sirvient{mf|e|a} más venerable del Inmortal».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Domin'{name}! Now and for all of time, you are the Bloodwarden and the Undying One's most venerable servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del Visir retumba y te saca de tus ensoñaciones.{/n} «¡La muerte le ha aceptado, Domin'{name}! Ahora y siempre, será Custodi{mf|o|a} de Sangre, {mf|el|la} sirvient{mf|e|a} más venerable del Inmortal».

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールが突然けたたましい声を上げ、あなたを思考から無理やり引き離す。{/n}「死があなたを受け入れた、エニム・{name}！これより先、あなたは血の監視者であり、不死の者の最も崇高な従者となる」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Domin'{name}! Now and for all of time, you are the Bloodwarden and the Undying One's most venerable servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールが突然けたたましい声を上げ、あなたを思考から無理やり引き離す。{/n}「死があなたを受け入れた、エニム・{name}！これより先、あなたは血の監視者であり、不死の者の最も崇高な従者となる」

languages.text: {n}宿老的声音突然变得如同雷鸣一般，将你从沉思中唤醒。{/n}“死亡已经接受了您，秘者{name}！从今往后，您就是鲜血守望者，是不死神皇最受人尊敬的仆从。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Domin'{name}! Now and for all of time, you are the Bloodwarden and the Undying One's most venerable servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老的声音突然变得如同雷鸣一般，将你从沉思中唤醒。{/n}“死亡已经接受了您，秘者{name}！从今完后，您就是鲜血守望者，是不死神皇最受人尊敬的仆从。”

languages.text: {n}La voix du vizir tonne subitement à votre oreille, interrompant le fil de vos pensées.{/n} « La mort vous a {mf|accepté|acceptée}, Domin'{name} ! À compter d'aujourd'hui et jusqu'à la fin des temps, vous êtes {mf|le gardien|la gardienne} du sang et {mf|le|la} plus vénérable {mf|serviteur|servante} de l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Domin'{name}! Now and for all of time, you are the Bloodwarden and the Undying One's most venerable servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix du vizir tonne subitement à votre oreille, interrompant le fil de vos pensées.{/n} « La mort vous a {mf|accepté|acceptée}, Domin'{name} ! À compter d'aujourd'hui et jusqu'à la fin des temps, vous êtes {mf|le gardien|la gardienne} du sang et {mf|le|la} plus vénérable {mf|serviteur|servante} de l'Immortel. »

languages.text: {n}Vezir'in sesi, aniden gümbürdeyerek seni düşüncelerinden çekip çıkarıyor.{/n} "Ölüm sizi kabul etti Domin'{name}! Bugünden itibaren ebediyen Kan Bekçisi ve Ölmeyen'in en muhterem hizmetkârısınız."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice grows suddenly thunderous and snaps you out of your reflections.{/n} "Death has accepted you, Domin'{name}! Now and for all of time, you are the Bloodwarden and the Undying One's most venerable servant."
